Source.Name: perl-readonly
Source.Summary: Readonly - Facility for creating read-only scalars, arrays, hashes
Source.Description: This is a facility for creating non-modifiable variables. This is useful for configuration files, headers, etc. It can also be useful as a development and debugging tool for catching updates to variables that should not be changed.

Package.Name: perl-readonly
Package.Summary: Readonly - Facility for creating read-only scalars, arrays, hashes
Package.Description: This is a facility for creating non-modifiable variables. This is useful for configuration files, headers, etc. It can also be useful as a development and debugging tool for catching updates to variables that should not be changed.
